website_summaries.verdict: This all-natural shea butter is rich in vitamins A and E, and boosts collagen production for smooth, young-looking skin.
pros: Works for both face and body
Only a small amount is needed
You can even use it on your hair for conditioning

customer_reviews.title: Shea butter me please!
customer_reviews.text: Came just in time for the cold Midwest winter. Shea butter has worked wonders for my hair. Its so soft and moisturized! And my skin????? Is finally holding some moisture! Perfect for the cold winter months. Will definitely buy more and experiment with the different suggestions in the pamphlet. For those wondering. This comes in a raw form but melts very easily in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shea Butter
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality shea butter. I like the thickness of it. You have to heat it up in your hands to get it to spread easier but it lasts on my skin all day. My skin and nails are so soft. I'll try it on my hair next!
customer_reviews.author: 2Bornot2B

customer_reviews.title: Product of China.. gross product! Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product that does not smell good.. It's like cement!! This is the product of China that was only packaged in the United States.. So, I'm not even sure what the standards are, or if it's truly organic. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scam and Fake product 😢
customer_reviews.text: This is not nutty scent as explained on the description. It has a strong odor that is impossible to handle. Too many FAKE products here in Amazon. I will spread this problem out to social media.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi YV

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed at the BLACK BUTTER I received! What a waste!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a very disappointing purchase for me and I'm a huge supporter of the company Sky Organics. I bought many other products and so I thought to buy my shea butter from here as well. Lo and behold, there's a funny scent, it's black in the middle - I believe it's expired and I will include pictures. I can't believe they'd send a product like this to their consumers. I am very, VERY disappointed and if it did not cost so much to ship back, I would have. Won't be buying any butters from here again. Clearly, the Best By date is a JOKE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: FAKE/SCAM - NOT AN ORGANIC PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Sold as "Organic Shea Butter by Sky Organics (16 oz) 100% Pure Unrefined Raw African Shea Butter for Face and Body Moisturizing Natural Body Butter for Dry Skin" with USDA Organic logo clearly in picture. Product arrived missing USDA Organic logo, and clearly says "Not an organic product" under ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Pure Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost through my first container and I couldn't be more pleased with the results. I use the Shea butter on my feet before bed. My feet are soft and nourished and at age 63 that's a miracle. Because you have to "melt" the butter, I use the excess on my arms and hands. Heavenly. Just a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: One Witness

customer_reviews.title: Not Organic! False Description!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Shea butter advertised and was described as organic. See the product pictures...then see my photo. Not only does it state on the container I received “not an organic product,” it is a different variety of Shea Butter (different species). I’m disappointed in the false description and advertising. I promptly returned it. Read the labels!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nature Girl

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible! Hard and not easy to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Was hard and not easy to work with. Smells terrible! I waited to long to return so now I’m stuck with two containers!! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: This Product is Fraudulently Advertised as Organic
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE: This product is pictured with a USDA ORGANIC label on it, and listed as organic. The Sky ORGANICS Shea Butter I received was not organic; in fact the label states "Not an organic product." (see picture) Other reviewers have had the same problem. Why is this seller allowed to continue fraudulently advertising the product as organic and selling it??
customer_reviews.author: Che Lane

customer_reviews.title: IT IS ROTTEN! BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: NEW REVIEW: I don't know why this product is now coming rotten and smelling rancid. It smells so disgusting and has an odd texture now. There is no longer that nutty smell. Perhaps it is not being stored properly. I ordered two and they both came ROTTEN. I used to buy this stuff since 2017. I will upload pictures soon on how they look like now with their lumpy texture. BE CAREFUL on putting rancid lotion on your skin! OLD REVIEW: Love this product. This is the second time I buy it. It is thick and very moisturizing. It’s has a nutty smell and an ivory color. I use this as my everyday lotion for my body.
customer_reviews.author: arianna

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This product has the consistency of a crumbly cookie dough and will not spread even after being warned in your hands. Maybe I got a bad batch. If not this is unusable if you want to put clothes on the same day
customer_reviews.author: MARSHA

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this at all. The smell/horrible. It's rock hard and inconvenient. Will not buy again. Can still buy good pure shea mixed with a good carrier oil like almond, jojoba, etc, and a nice essential oil scent. Which is so much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Bad Smell
customer_reviews.text: This was a repeat order, but the quality is not the same as my previous order. This order smells bad and the color is uneven. There are patches of white and that's the one that smells more rotten. Unfortunately i just opened the product today and missed the return window. Can this be returned to the supplier?
customer_reviews.author: Evalyn

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard- can’t even get out of the jar!
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT recommend this cream! It arrived with a small hole in the protective foil and was rock hard. Although I emailed Skyorganics, I never got a response. However, when I contacted Amazon, they replaced the jar. However, this cream is rock hard also! As in I can’t get any out, even using my fingernails! I also don’t care for the odor, but would overlook that if the product were usable. Shea butter is great and most products with it are soft and creamy. I had to toss this stuff and won’t order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I gave my daughter the bottle because she uses it for her psoriasis. I didn't realize how much my skin would miss it. I'm turning forty eight and I really think this is working great for my wrinkles. I also think it is helping to grow my eyelashes too....they seems to be getting longer? It is thicker, so I put it on mainly at night, although lately I have been using in the morning too.
customer_reviews.author: Shonte

customer_reviews.title: Working wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I recently just cut off all my hair because it was in such bad condition so I decided to start from scratch. After the chop I started cleaning my hair with nothing but water and the using the shea butter on my scalp and I must say its been doing amazing things for my hair! I'm noticing its growing back thicker and even has a curl that I didn't have before, going the organic route was the best decision ever.
customer_reviews.author: mel.w

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Not Organic!
customer_reviews.text: This shea butter is advertised as organic in the title, description, and the photo even includes the USDA Organic symbol on the label. Also, other reviewers have posted photos from this listing that shows organic shea butter. However, the product I received was not organic. It even stated in fine print: "Not an organic product" and was without the USDA Organic label. This wouldn't have been a problem had I not specifically purchased it because it was advertised in multiple places as being organic. The seller needs to fix the listing or actually send what is advertised in order to be truthful.
customer_reviews.author: Miss

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising. NOT ORGANIC.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT organic. They show you the first photo with the USDA organic label- claiming this is an organic product and it is NOT. What you receive is a product with NO USDA organic label and it actually says “not an organic product” on the back. This is false advertising and misleading. Shame on amazon and Sky Organics for trying to dupe people into buying your product.
customer_reviews.author: N/A

customer_reviews.title: NOT ORGANIC
customer_reviews.text: bought my first jug in 2017 and now it is 2020 and I finally finished it! BUT looked into their certification now and its been suspended. and it seems it never specified that their Shea Butter is organic or even 100% organic. and it seems its been expired for a long time even though it has to be submitted yearly. total scam
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT ORGANIC!!
customer_reviews.text: The title says this is organic, the name of the company ha the word organic in it, the packaging boasts that it is naturally made, and then the ingredients state that it is NOT organically made?? I don’t understand. I would not have purchased if I knew the advertisement was a lie.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Product issue!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for sometime, unfortunately I received this product as attached. Something went wrong?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Indumathi Perumal

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product, Not Real
customer_reviews.text: Here is what you need to know about this "Shea" butter, 1. not actually the weight, they included packaging in the 16oz. 2. Reeks, lord it stinks, never ever had a Shea butter smell so damn bad. 3. color is wrong and spread wrong. Pretty sure this Shea butter is mixed with something, possibly wax to be honest. Wont be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: This stuff stays on skin for awhile
customer_reviews.text: Surprised when grabbing some out of container. Real thick substance that you rub vigrously to to thin then apply onto your skin. My legs and hands were really drying and regular lotions were not working for real moisture long-term. This stuff is thick but keep your skin moist overnight. Give it a try, it's just odd initially in that it feels like mud until you warm it up in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Big Earl

customer_reviews.title: This brand of Shea butter is AMAZING! I never leave reviews but a company like ...
customer_reviews.text: This brand of Shea butter is AMAZING! I never leave reviews but a company like this deserves it. I just wanted to say that people complain of the smell, listen this is UNREFINED raw Shea butter, this isn't the I smell like heaven I just bought this chemical laden product from Sephora. It's not suppose to smell good. Also people don't know how to use it. Your suppose to use a small amount in your palm until the gritty texture is gone and your palms are left glossy then you apply it to your body. I got this for prevention of pregnancy stretch marks and already my skin looks healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Beutel

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT IS NOT ORGANIC AS STATED! Not going by the same from the description and ingredient list, I assumed this product was organic, BIG MISTAKE!! Once I used the Shea Butter, I read the back of label and plain as day manufacturer stated "THIS IS NOT AN ORGANIC PRODUCT." This Shea Butter is soooooo oily, I ruined a whole batch of product. Which had other products in it as well. I will be returning and no longer continuing a business relationship with this company. Thank you Amazon, for making the return process so easy and stress free!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Organic Shea Butter ♡
customer_reviews.text: This organic shea butter from Ghana is pretty fresh. Off the bat, I don't like it as much as Mary Tyler Naturals' organic shea butter, but I do like that it comes in a jar rather than a plastic bag. It's very easy to use, and its moisturizing and healing properties are excellent. You can use this directly on your skin and hair, or use it in a multitude of DIY skincare and bodycare products. The natural smell is pretty strong, but that's normal since it's unrefined. Overall, this is a good product that I'd consider purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: P@¡n ₩@rr¡0rTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Not organic
customer_reviews.text: The item I received was not organic and said so right on the label. I returned it without opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B

customer_reviews.title: Not an organic product
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed this time. The 1st time I ordered this product I fell in love! I ordered organic shea butter. It was ivory and the best I ever had. I've tried on 2 seperate occasions to order the same one from before (organic) and two separate occasions I have received a different Shea butter that is not organic. Please send organic products when ordered by customers. I don't mind paying a little more if I have to, but if I order organic and then get a different product it is very disappointing. It clearly says In this advertisement organic she butter, but on the container there is an indication that the product is not organic.
customer_reviews.author: Unique Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(  No “USDA” Seal.  Not As Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered because of the “USDA” certificate, but the product I received seems to be old or from another category: NO “USDA” label and NOT the same design. I am disappointed. Too much trouble to return or exchange, so I’ll keep this jar to use on my legs and feet only. Not sure if I will reorder from this seller in the future. However, the product is moisturizing and seems ok. When you advertise a product, the customer expects to get the EXACT product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in USA

customer_reviews.title: This product is No Longer Organic
customer_reviews.text: This item was under my subscribe & save shipping. In the past the item was always organic - like the description states. However, this time it arrived and the ingredients say this is not an organic shea product. I returned it and requested the organic product I had ordered, thinking it had just been an accident. Unfortunately, the 2nd item they sent was the exact same as the 1st. The description of this product is inaccurate - beware. Take care & stay safe!
customer_reviews.author: candice herbert

customer_reviews.title: 16 oz WITH container
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, good or bad, but wanted to mention there is a big dip/gap/hole right in the middle of the container of shea butter I received (I've seen other pictures with the same thing). So, I decided to weigh my item on my food scale. It came out to be 16 oz exactly. I assumed I would be getting 16 oz. of product...not product along with the container. I don't have anything to say regarding the actual product, since I just got it...but, for the money paid, a full container would have been nice. Just saying... :)
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Drier than a bone.
customer_reviews.text: The jar was cracked as of it had been dropped. The inside cover was ripped off and the “Shea butter” was impenetrable.... even with a knife. It was drier than an old bone. So disappointing and a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dower

customer_reviews.title: NOT organic
customer_reviews.text: Despite the company name as well as the listing claiming this is organic, on the bottle it says it’s not organic. The product itself is fine, but I pay extra for organic items and I don’t like being lied to. Also it comes in a plastic tub and I’m trying to use plastic as little as possible.
customer_reviews.author: daniela

customer_reviews.title: Very strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different Shea butters and this one has by far the strongest most potent scent. I know shea butter has a little bit of a smell, but this one smells kind of like green olives. I make my own homemade lotion bars and body butters, and the smell of this was so overpowering that the whole batch I made with this was affected, and the essential oils I used doesn’t cover it up. I’m not sure what I’m going to do with the rest of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Palmer

customer_reviews.title: The best Shea Butter
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. This is by far the best Shea Butter I've tried , I have hormonal acne, sensitive skin and this does not irritate me at all, I love that the expiration date is on package and the dark tub it comes in, I will forever use this after my black soap.......
customer_reviews.author: Ms ve

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: Its shea but has a bit of a stronger smell then other sheas I've purchased (not sure why or what this is). Also not as smooth as other sheas a bit on the grainier side. Over all the product is alright, it melts like it should when making lotions and it moisturizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat purchaser of this product and was restocking my soon to end jar because the last shea butter company I used for about 2 years just became unreliable in its product quality. Now its happening again but this time sooner... it smells awful.... a rancid stinky scent. That was not my previous experience. I wrote a review last night prior to opening the jar and noted that the label was a bit different from my last jar but alas the scent is too too upsetting!! Was hoping this would be my new shea butter company.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not Organic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item specifically because it stated that it was organic in the product description. I was making a body butter, and then noticed that the jar did not have the USDA Organic symbol on it. When I looked at the the ingredients it stated that it was NOT an organic product. You should really change your item description to truthfully represent this shea butter.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Shea Butter surprised me
customer_reviews.text: I received my order yesterday and last night I used the Shea Butter as a night cream. I bought the Shea Butter because I am having trouble with my face drying out from a new face wash I tried. This morning my face felt much softer and no longer felt dry. I had trouble with my upper lip chapping and the Shea Butter helped it considerably. So far, I am very pleased and can't wait to see the results of using the Shea Butter each night as a night cream.
customer_reviews.author: C.C. from Oregon

customer_reviews.title: This shea butter smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Well, I opened the shea butter and it smells terrible. Not knowing any better, I still moved forward with making homemade body butter only to realize that mixing it with an oil did not diffuse the scent at all. Shea butter is not suppose to smell unless its gone bad or poor quality. I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Noel

customer_reviews.title: Worse Shea Butter
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it is real Shea butter. I have used through out my pregnancy to prevent stretch marks yet after delivery I had so many stretch marks like I have used nothing. I regret that I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Hira Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Moldy and oxidation —UPDATE: all GOOD-replacement quick and good!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product before with no issues but this time it appears to be mold in the center— it’s a little furry. Oxidation on the the sides. I have put in for a replacement so hopefully that the next one will be ok. I’ll update. Update::Sky Organics sent me a replacement for the moldy Shea butter—I received it quick—in 2 days. It is good In shape-looks and smell correct. Thank you-I’ll continue to use this company they took care of my issue quickly and without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with a little sweet almond oil to use as an intense skin moisturizer in the winter, which works great. Lately I'm applying it several times a day to try to prevent stretch marks this pregnancy... keeping my fingers crossed! I can't compare this Shea butter to other brands because I love it so much that I haven't tried any others. It does have a different sort of nutty smell that took some getting used to, but it's not overpowering or anything and would be easy to cover up with essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Provides good moisture for very dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I like it was delivered on time as promised. The texture is ok but it a very hard though it heats. Up from skin contact and melts so it becomes spreadable. Another alternative is to heat for a few seconds in the microwave. The scent is very light and does not interfere with other fragrances you may have on your body. All in all a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good shea butter
customer_reviews.text: I love using the natural shea butter for my body. These can get a little hard to spread, especially when it's cooler in the house. You just scrape a little off and put the lotion in the palm of your hands and rub them together until the balm melts and then you can spread it on your skin. Love this because it's pretty much scent free.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything to get rid of the smell. perhaps a refined one is better.
customer_reviews.author: adele

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because it said that it was organic several places in the details and ingredients portion. I received the product and it clearly states that it’s not an organic product. I’m very disappointed in the false advertising of Sky Organics! I will not be ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: grayson langelier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Moisturizer for Hair and Face
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product principally to moisturize my hair and scalp, and sometimes a tiny amount to moisturize my face if it is especially dry. It's quite thick, so you will need to use a fingernail to dig the proper amount out before rubbing it between your hands to get it to a more workable consistency. On that note you could probably also use it to style your hair, as it sets pretty nicely. I worry because I have seen some claims that this product actually isn't fair trade. This would be really unfortunate, because it's an excellent product and I've gotten everyday use out of it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter S. DiCicco

customer_reviews.title: Natural, organic shea butter
customer_reviews.text: So when I bought this I was expecting it to be whipped, the fact that it is not is my fault. This is hardened and not so easy to spread. If you're a DIY type person this is great for recipes to make body butters. If not it is rather hard to spread. I plan to whip this up with a few different ingredients to make it a little more pleasant to apply. I am pleased with the product as it is natural shea butter. I myself do not care for the natural scent of shea butter so I plan to add some essential oils to give it more of a scent I desire. Overall worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Denter

customer_reviews.title: Not organic!
customer_reviews.text: The product description says this is organic but The actual container specifically says *not an organic product*. I’m very disappointed because the description is quite misleading and I would have not purchased this had I known I would be sent a non-organic product. This is my 2nd shea butter purchase from this seller, and the 1st purchase was great, received an organic product. Not sure what happened this time but I will not purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Celeryjuice

customer_reviews.title: They got me...
customer_reviews.text: Read the label thoroughly...What I ordered is not what I received. I ordered an organic product...I received a jar with a label that clearly states that the "Sky Organics" Shea butter is "Not an organic product." Pretty upset. Not surprised. I DID order it from Amazon... Overall, the product is very moisturizing. The title link for this should not advertise that the product is organic; Especially if the label itself will negate that statement.
customer_reviews.author: Gaelyn

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I'm obsessed!!!!!! My face has has terrible eczema / rashes for....gosh, as long as I can remember - puberty maybe. I've been using this for 3 days and it's indescribably better. My face is smooth, the rash has died WAY down, the red has gone WAY down. I can't wait to see what it looks like after a week or two. I'm blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This is what it says it is. Solid when at room temp and melts with skin heat. Smells like shea should smell. I have fair, sensitive and oily skin. I love this stuff! At night I apply a small pea size amount to the palm of my hand to heat and soften. Then apply to my face, it has helped to add moisture to my skin so less oilyness through out my day.
customer_reviews.author: Brittainy

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Shea butter for my hair and skin for nearly a decade but hadn’t tried this brand. Despite the numerous excellent reviews I found this brand to be hard as a rock and nearly impossible to emulsify. I’ve had to add body oil. Idk if I got a bad batch or this is the norm but no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Best Stea Butter Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this 16 oz size of the Pure Unrefined Raw Shea Butter. We live in Arizona and have to fight the dry climate on our skin. This product has been great. We especially use it for our feet and any other area that is especially dry. It is thick when you take it out of the jar but blends with your skin when applied. Jar lasts a log time as you need a small amount of the product to do the job. I have recommend this product to many of my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bizarre form of eczema and have had to use a lot of prescription medications and Vaseline that really made me uncomfortable because of their pharmacology. With eczema the skin is missing certain vitamins and minerals which cause the breakdown. I wanted something natural to replace what was needed. I bought this shea butter and Almond oil and it is amazing. I’m soft- for the first time in forever!! No “chicken bumps!” Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: katl

customer_reviews.title: great product for dry feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have found this to be a very high quality product and have been using it regularly for months! I live in a climate where flip flops are worn often and my feet are always dry but the shea butter has really helped! I would have given this 5 stars but when the product arrived, it was gritty and I had to melt it and then freeze it. It did work to make it smooth and has nothing to do with product quality, but more the temperature changes during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: cararoxo

customer_reviews.title: Holy Moly I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid when I bought this last year that it would smell bad or not last long. However, there is no strong scent and my jar is still almost completely full even though I use it throughout the day every single day! It's long lasting, moisturized SO WELL and I just feel so soft, so light and beautiful when I use my shea butter. This company and their products are the absolute best. I won't ever use another moisturizer or buy my shea butter from another company! They have me for life!
customer_reviews.author: Shellby Huston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. It is thick
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It is thick, but when mixing it with a carrier oil such as Argan oil, blends nicely..so nice to finally begin converting over to DIY products and getting away from the commercial ones..what a difference in how my skin feels. It does take time, but when you do it little by little, so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: M. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love Shea Butter! I use it on everything, cracked skin, very dry skin, itchy skin. It works wonders sometimes. This product smells just like unrefined Shea Butter should smell, which is a good thing. Means it's legit. It's not a "nice" fragrance, but I like it because it's natural and pure. The consistency was perfect. Smooth and easy to get out because it's hot where I live. In the winter, it would probably be a bit grainy and harder, but then I'd just warm it up in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Moon StarsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product - it really is just a jar full of high quality shea butter. I usually just take a chunk, warm it in my hands, and use it to help with dry skin at night before bed, but it's very versatile since it's the raw shea butter. There's also a ton of it, so it'll last for a very long time. It has a light, nutty smell that's not unpleasant but not my favorite either. I usually layer it with another, scented lotion but that is just my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might be the miracle I've been waiting for!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from extremely dry feet for years. I have tried everything. Results have only been temporary. I ran across this and thought what do I have to lose. I'm so happy I did. I recieved it yesterday and have used it 3 times. I can tell this is going to be the miracle I've been waiting for. I see a difference already. I will continue to use this and update my review if needed. The only downfall is the smell. Thank goodness it goes away after about 15 mins or so.
customer_reviews.author: juju

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: This arrived well packaged and on time. This worked wonders for me! I had been dealing with dry and itchy legs and shoulders for months I was scratching so much I had given myself some scars. I had tried a variety of lotions but never liked they way they felt after applying them. This Shea butter needs to be warmed before applying, it goes on smooth and absorbs well. The smell is a faint nutty one which is fine by me. It has been 3 days of use and I feel like my skin is fairing so much better. I am no longer dry or itchy. I look forward to the benifits of continued use!
customer_reviews.author: A Google User

customer_reviews.title: Causes rash
customer_reviews.text: Product causes a rash for me and my son. Neither him nor I are allergic to shea butter and have both used it many times in the past without issue. I believe the product was contaminated with bacteria or something. It didn't really smell rancid. Not super fresh either. Smell wise it seemed okay to me though. But overall I have to give this a 1/5 since it causes skin irritation. I have seen several other reviews on here mentioning a similar problem.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaC

customer_reviews.title: Cure-All for Damaged Skin
customer_reviews.text: This shea butter is AMAZING! It nourishes the skin so beautifully. I even rub this butter on my children's skin if they get sunburned, and it works like a charm to soothe the sting and seems to almost reverse the damage. I've also put it on razor burn, and it removes the discomfort and balances the skin. The only downside is that it is very thick and does not spread easily unless warmed or combined with other ingredients. For example, if I add it to homemade products, such as deodorant, it spreads just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasantly Surprised!

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard and impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: This Shea butter was rock hard. I know shea butter comes in solid form and I’ve been using Shea butter for a long time, but I can’t even dip my finger into this, press down and scoop any out. It has a crusty top. I tried to heat it and it didn’t work either.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: It's Alright
customer_reviews.text: The container came scuffled up and dirty. It looked used. I didn't like that much and the butter had some weird swirl in it when I opened it. The butter works well but it takes some time for it to really go inside your skin. It also takes some time for it to melt in your hand so that could be annoying if you're in a rush. It feels like grease on your face for the first couple of minutes but will eventually get absorbed. All in all, I say it's alright so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nox

customer_reviews.title: A Skin's BEST FRIEND
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from severely dry skin and this Shea butter has saved my poor itchy, scaly DEHYDRATED skin ! I used it all over my body and I received immediate relief ! Skin stays moisturized and hydrated for over 48 hours. I have used shea butter in the past, and the texture of this product was somewhat unfamiliar at first ( I think it's possibly because it's cold pressed ) but it was no biggie because it doesn't clump and it melts in your hands. Very easy to spread on large areas. The scent is very subtle. I am so RELIEVED I received this !
customer_reviews.author: Lucila Samra

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thick, creamy consistency that you may need a spoon to get out of the jar. This is good for a nighttime routine as it takes a long time to soak into your skin because it's so thick. Make sure you have your hair out of the way when you have this on or it will get sticky and greasy. Great for putting on your feet, elbows, knees, or any other dry areas on your skin. Very cheap, high quality, and lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Alison LaFlamme

customer_reviews.title: Great as a skin moisturizer and it was a replacement for another brand.
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good deal at about 12-bucks on Subscribe & Save and was a replacement for CLEOPATRA'S CHOICE ORGANIC RAW SHEA BUTTER when the price increased. I can’t see any difference in the two products so no complaints here gets it 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for hair 6 months and counting!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I have been using this product for 6 months and it’s amazing. My hair has grown so much and it’s a lot more healthier than before. A small amount goes a long way. I am still on my same jar and it’s been 6 months. The texture is very smooth. I use this product on my daughters hair as well and it’s been amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - helps even the driest skin
customer_reviews.text: My husband developed DRESS Syndrome - a horrible reaction to a medication - and his skin turned bright red and as dry as the Sahara. It would flake and peel non-stop. I would apply this and it would provide relief for hours. I was honestly surprised at how well this worked, considering in what rough shape his skin was in. I have to give this stuff 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine T. Crist

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed when I received this product
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I received this product. I was just a plain jar..no label, no nothing on it. I am not about to put something on my skin that has no label on it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms_TnD

customer_reviews.title: Locks in moisture.
customer_reviews.text: Do your research. You'll need to whip it, or at least rub it vigorously between your finger tips before applying, but it's great for your face, hair & body. Also, it does not clog pores!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant?! Get it right now
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I'm using it since the beginning of my pregnancy, now I'm 36 weeks and no stretch marks!!!! My skin feels amazing. I would absolutely recommend this to all the people who will have a big change in their bodies, for pregnancy or weight change. I use a lot every night all around my body and I wear stretchy clothes after to keep my skin hydrated without leaving everything on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: D. B

customer_reviews.title: Nice-Smelling, Moisturizing Shea Butter
customer_reviews.text: I just received Sky Organics Shea Butter this evening and was pleasantly surprised by the scent. Having tried other shea butter that smelled rancid, I found this one has a woodsy smell, which I really like. I've only applied it once so far and it seems to moisturize well. My palms are cracked from playing an African drum and I think this will work well to heal them. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes well
customer_reviews.text: I like this product i ordered it before with no problems. It does what it is supposed to do and I will continue to order it. However, this time it is extremely hard. My last shipment was not. It is so hard that I am breaking it up with a knife and trying to mash it. Once i do all if that, I can spread it but I have lumps to spread.
customer_reviews.author: Keep It Real

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This smells rancid. I've used pure shea butter for over a decade from various companies, but never had one smell like this. When first opened there were bubbles on the surface, so perhaps it had been improperly stored? There's no expiration date to know if its past its prime. Also it it difficult to spread, but I can't wait to get this off of me.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Essential for skin care
customer_reviews.text: This shea butter is a vital part of my skin care routine. It moisturizes so much better than the thin lotions that are typically available in stores! It has a light natural scent, is easy to apply right out of the jar, and soaks into the skin fairly quickly and keeps my skin from feeling dry for hours. I always keep a jar in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Sealing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m so very disappointed from sky organics! I received my Shea butter two days ago however , when I was unboxing the product excited to try it I discovered out that the Shea butter was not very well sealed it was opened -as per attached- . Therefore, I’m m not planing to use at all as I have no idea about the expiration date nor the date the Shea butter was opened !! I used to like sky organics product I once tried the coconut oil however, I’m not trying to shop again form sky organic after my bad experience with the very bad quality of sealing !! I feel like I wasted my money !!
customer_reviews.author: Nader Manasfi

customer_reviews.title: NOT USDA Organic, False Advertising.
customer_reviews.text: There is NO USDA Organic stamp as advertised on the product I received, instead there is a fake self-made '100% Organic' logo meant to imitate the size and shape of the USDA logo.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shea butter!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shea butter I have ever used!! I've tried many others, and the texture was not as nice as this one. Also, it keeps my skin moistured and soft all day. I've been searching for a good shea butter with no chemicals for almost 2 years and this is the best for me by far!
customer_reviews.author: Pam T

customer_reviews.title: Seal Was Broken - it’s okay product
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail and I am a little weary of it. The top was not completely on the jar and the seal was broken. EDIT: I contacted the company (Sky Organics) and they are sending me a whole new jar for free! They were really nice and quick about it. However, I wish this was more of a butter/lotion texture. It feels oily and greasy and acts like coconut oil. It seems to be making my skin break out too. Not sure what I’m going to do with two jars of this stuff now. It’s also kinda smelly, but that’s what shea butter smells like.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: Not for total body
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a body cream for ur body this is not it. Maybe for hands or feet at the most. This is greasy doesn’t absorb quickly and does not spread well at all. I tried it in my hair and it just made it greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Source for Any Natural High Quality Products
customer_reviews.text: Not only I received this product without an issue but Sara emailed me to check on me and attached an ebook with homemade recipes. I bought this product for the high quality and to use it I a recipe for homemade moisturizer but it turned out to be too oily. Sara's recipe appears to be simpler and less oily. I look forward to try Sara's recipe and have her as a trusted source to purchase whatever other products she has for anything I decide to make.
customer_reviews.author: Yara Arias

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY product that helped my dry itchy skin. Warm it up in your hands first and apply where bumpy and dry and itchy. You only need to apply this once a day, preferably after a shower...stays on all day and calms dry irritated itchy skin. I don't know why dermatologists don't recommend this product first...I spent a lot of money trying other creams and moisturizers and even prescription strength....nothing works like this product! You have my seal of approval!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time buying and using this butter, it's hard to the touch but I scratch the amount need it and it melts in my hands easily. It feels very good and and not greasy. The smell, although it not very pleasant but, nothing wrong with it, I'm assuming is how Shea butter smells. However I added some essential oils and smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Libre

customer_reviews.title: No sharps, no mold, no staining
customer_reviews.text: This is unscented, at least to our nostrils. We sometimes add drops of essential oils or leave it as is. I use a small wooden spoon to scoop it out. It is relatively soft, moreso in warm temps. A s a repeat buyer, I have never found any discoloration or mold or lumps of sharp items as I have in other brands. It is also not a deep yellow which stains light colors, but is more of a cream color.
customer_reviews.author: La Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry, but I didn’t like the Sky Organics Shea butter. It was way to greasy for me and I didn’t like the it was very gritty. I’ll be returning this. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Bmb

customer_reviews.title: It's SHEA BUTTER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product received packaged tightly. I thought it would be creamy but had no problems with removing a portion for mixing worth oils. Never used Shea butter before but I'm sure this will work well for my dry brittle hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia W.

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: Both the shea butter and the customer service provided by Sky Organics are top notch! The shea melts into your skin, which stays moisturized for days, and seems to magically heal raw, chapped skin overnight. There was a small issue with my last order (which probably had nothing to do with Sky Organics) and they went out of their way to make it right, which I really appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: NicD

customer_reviews.title: love this shea butter
customer_reviews.text: It spreads as most shea butter does it takes a bit to smooth on but the moister lasts and it helps my daughters ruff skin better then typical lotions. i can wash my hands a few times before they dry and i need to reapply as this penetrates the skin deeper and heals my cracks better.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Do better sky organics, you were doing so good.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second shea butter I bought from sky organics. My first one was great but my second order the shea butter smells funky and stale. It didn’t smell like the previous one I ordered. The smell made my stomach sick and it had a dark grey color. I had to throw it out. I have all your oils which I love but you guys turned me off with my second shea butter order. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Carl Michael Hoeggren

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful, high quality shea butter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shea butter for the purpose of making lotions and balms. I have not used it for that yet, but I already love this shea butter and am glad I chose this one. I love the consistency and texture. On it's own it softened my very dry hands, so I know it will be great in a lotion/cream. I've purchased other brands before, and not only did they not have as good of a texture, but they also had an unpleasant scent, even while being "unscented". This shea butter does not have that. It has a natural, very light, nutty smell. I will absolutely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but could use a more environmental-friendly container
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a natural moisturizer for your skin. I just wish the container was glass with a metal lid. I use this at night after washing my face and my skin looks amazing! I also suggest putting a small bit in the bath to help keep the rest of your skin soft and glowing.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff takes a bit to get used to b/c it's so thick. But once you get it warmed up and melted in your hands from friction it goes on smooth and is a great moisturizer. Love the earthy scent to it as well, no fragrances, just a 'natural' scent. Will be getting more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jean S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well with psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: I have a moderate case of psoriasis. It grows much worse in the winter in the Northeast. To control it for years I used coal tar and mixed it with a doctor prescribed steroid both of, which are probably toxic. I had a especially bad outbreak with many flaky, itchy burning sores. Looking for a healthier and safer alternative I decided to give this a try. Using it twice a day for the two days they are either healing and faded or cleared altogether. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel123

customer_reviews.title: Creamy, Rich, and Delightful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smooth consistency, which I have used straight from jar, in addition to dabbling in creating different mixtures! I have ridiculously sensitive skin that is very dry, and this shea butter, for me, is a miracle! No adverse skin reaction, quickly absorbed, and my 68-year-old skin now feels remarkably smooth! I'm a forever fan! LOVE, LOVE this Sky Organics Shea Butter... the very reasonable price is an added bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: NancyJB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is so PERFECT!!!!! Unrefined, raw, organic and pure. I'm SO HAPPY that I found this!!!!! Highly recommend this brand. Other reviews mentioned poor packaging/rancid product upon arrival. I didnt have this issue. And I'm hoping for the sake of others, that the company fixed the problem because this stuff is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Organic Shea Butter by Sky Organics (16 oz) 100% Pure Unrefined Raw African Shea Butter for Face and Body Moisturizing Natural Body Butter for Dry Skin
feature_bullets: Contains: 1 x 16 oz. tub of raw Organic Shea Butter by Sky Organics
Deeply Moisturizes Dry Skin: Our raw Organic Shea Butter moisturizes skin and helps soften and smooth dry areas.
100% Raw and Unrefined Shea Butter: Sky Organics Shea Butter is 100% pure and unrefined to retain all of its beauty benefits – it is not a whipped body butter or shea butter lotion.
Face and Body Butter for Dry Skin: Use Shea Butter on the face and body for long lasting moisture.
Responsibly Made African Shea Butter: Sky Organics Shea Butter is responsibly sourced and is 100% vegan and cruelty-free.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
